subject: RE: [junit] Junit & Ant.
msgSnippet: What version of Ant are you using?  I m using 1.4alpha, whose docs say that nested arg s are supported:
messageBody:
What version of Ant are you using? I'm using 1.4alpha, whose
docs say that nested arg's are supported:


<java classname="test.Main" >
<arg value="-h"/>
<classpath>
<pathelement location="\test.jar"/>
<pathelement path="${java.class.path}"/>
</classpath>
</java>

--
Erik Meade emeade@...
Senior Consultant Object Mentor, Inc.
http://www.junit.org

> -----Original Message-----
> From: selena su [mailto:selena.su@...]
> Sent: Saturday, March 10, 2001 12:54 AM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [junit] Junit & Ant.
>
>
> Hi There:
> Thanks for those has given me comments about my previous queries.
>
> I got this error when i integrate Junit with Ant, does anyone has any
> ideas, what is the caused ?
>
> build.xml:36: Class class org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Java doesn't
> support the nested "arg" element
>
>
> thanks,
